message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it! I'm offering it to you for $140.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it. I'm really interested, but I'm only able to pay $125 right now. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $125 is a good offer, I'm hoping to get closer to $135. Would you be willing to go up just a little bit?
Alice, I understand you want to get closer to $135, but I'm really struggling to go higher than $130.  If we can meet in the middle there, I'm ready to make a deal.
